name: News Plugin
description: Interest-based news aggregator with P2P chat, user discovery, and personalized recommendations

features.name: Interest-based News Feed
features.description: Personalized news based on your interests with behavioral learning

features.name: P2P Chat
features.description: Real-time messaging with Gun.js, supports message history and typing indicators

features.name: User Discovery
features.description: Find users with similar interests based on location and activity

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Real-time notifications for new messages, matches, and relevant articles

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: Create and edit profiles with avatars, bio, and interests

features.name: Responsive Layout
features.description: 3-column layout for desktop, adaptive for tablet and mobile

permissions.name: location
permissions.description: Required for location-based news and user discovery

screenshots.description: Full desktop experience with settings, feed, and user discovery

screenshots.description: Responsive mobile layout with stacked feed and bottom sheet
